Malawi Marathon - Bring your own.productDescription:
BRING YOUR OWN TENT

There are few things more amazing than waking up, under canvas, hearing the lapping of waves against the sand, opening up your tent to look out over the rising African sun. If you want the value option, and the one that brings you closest to nature then this is the package for you. You'll be required to bring your own camping gear, but after that all your showers, toilets and food is arranged by us in the Athletes' Village. 

You will be nestled amongst the trees in our campsite that leads on to Lake Malawi. You will have 6 nights with us, including all your food, in-country transfers, project work, race entry, race stash and your finishing line gifts. This spectacular week includes everything from organising a crazy KidsRunWild sports day to building a local pre-school to distributing fuel-efficient stoves. Make no mistake about it, no other race gets you this deep into a rural African community, no other race gives you the experience that Impact Marathons do. 

This is running as you've never seen it before... and it's time to secure your place.
Malawi Marathon - Bring your own.pageTitle: Malawi Marathon - Bring your own - Impact Marathon Series

Malawi Marathon - Cormorant Camp.productDescription:
Our most popular option revolves around a beautiful Safari Tent. You'll be sharing this huge tent with up to 3 other awesome travellers who will become your best friends through the week. Loads of room, all washing and toilet facilities and a campsite like no other! You'll have a mattress and bedding in this simple arrangement and plenty of room for all your luggage. There are few things more amazing than waking up, under canvas, hearing the sloshing of waves against the sand, opening up your tent to look out over the rising African sun. 

You will be nestled amongst the trees in our campsite that leads on to Lake Malawi. You will have 6 nights with us, including all your food, in-country transfers, project work, race entry, race stash and your finishing line gifts. This spectacular week includes everything from organising a crazy KidsRunWild sports day to building a local pre-school to distributing fuel-efficient stoves. Make no mistake about it, no other race gets you this deep into a rural African community, no other race gives you the experience that Impact Marathons do. 

This is running as you've never seen it before... and it's time to secure your place.

Malawi Marathon - Kingfisher Camp.productDescription:
The option for those who like their own space. You will have a beautiful safari tent, with a bed and simple furnishings to make it homely! Shared with just one other awesome traveller who will become (or maybe already is!) your best friend. It's a brilliant way to experience the beauty of Africa yet also get stuck into the project work...There are few things more amazing than waking up, under canvas, hearing the sloshing of waves against the sand, opening up your tent to look out over the rising African sun. If you want the value option, and the one that brings you closest to nature than this is the package for you. 

You will be nestled amongst the trees in our campsite that leads on to Lake Malawi. You will have 6 nights with us, including all your food, in-country transfers, project work, race entry, race stash and your finishing line gifts. This spectacular week includes everything from organising a crazy KidsRunWild sports day to building a local pre-school to distributing fuel-efficient stoves. Make no mistake about it, no other race gets you this deep into a rural African community, no other race gives you the experience that Impact Marathons do. 

This is running as you've never seen it before... and it's time to secure your place.

Malawi Marathon - Fish Eagle Camp.productDescription:
For those of you who prefer to sleep under a solid roof (camping's not for everyone!), this is the option to float your boat. You'll share a brick-built chalet with one other runner and you'll enjoy an en suite bathroom. The room is furnished simply and includes beds (that's a bit of luck!), mosquito nets, basic furniture and amenities for that extra touch of home comfort.

The Athletes' Village is nestled amongst the trees that leads on to Lake Malawi. You will have 6 nights with us, including all your food, in-country transfers, project work, race entry, race stash and your finishing line gifts. This spectacular week includes everything from organising a crazy KidsRunWild sports day to building a local pre-school to distributing fuel-efficient stoves. Make no mistake about it, no other race gets you this deep into a rural African community, no other race gives you the experience that Impact Marathons do. 

This is running as you've never seen it before... and it's time to secure your place.

Nepal Impact Marathon: Bring your own eq.productName: Nepal Impact Marathon: Bring your own equipment
Nepal Impact Marathon: Bring your own eq.productDescription:
Living in our Athletes' Village is an unforgettable experience. Rise each morning for yoga as the sun rises over the Himalaya, spend the day working on inspiring projects in the local community, enjoy Momos and a cold beer at the Sunset Bar... then wrap up warm for a peaceful sleep. Not bad eh? 

The entire week is about community: the Nepali community; the Athlete's community and your own community at home. This is not a race but a platform to create massive social change and you are about to become part of a global movement to unleash the #powerofrunning. 

Bring Your Own Kit (BYOK) is our entry package: Your first night will be in a 3* hotel in Kathmandu, sharing with some other badass adventurers. After that you'll be in our Athletes' Village overlooking the Himalaya. You'll have a great pitch spot to put up your own tent and access to wash/toilet facilities. We all eat together, we all work together through the day and become one amazing team ready to change the world. 

Let's go to Nepal!!!
Nepal Impact Marathon: Bring your own eq.pageTitle: Nepal Impact Marathon: Bring your own equipment - Impact Marathon Series

Nepal Impact Marathon: Base Camp Package.productName: Nepal Impact Marathon: Base Camp Package
Nepal Impact Marathon: Base Camp Package.productDescription:
Living in our Athletes' Village is an unforgettable experience. Rise each morning for yoga as the sun rises over the Himalaya, spend the day working on inspiring projects in the local community, enjoy Momos and a cold beer at the Sunset Bar... then wrap up warm for a peaceful sleep. Not bad eh? 

The entire week is about community: the Nepali community; the Athletes' community and your own community at home. This is not a race but a platform to create massive social change and you are about to become part of a global movement to unleash the #powerofrunning. 

Without doubt our most popular option, this is the party spot! Your first night will be in a shared 3* hotel room in central Kathmandu. Housed on the south side of the campsite you'll have views all the way down the Kathmandu Valley - truly breath-taking. You'll be sharing with two other badass adventures who will become your best friends and running buddies.

We'll provide a big scout-camp style tent with floor mattresses, bedding and pillows. If you feel the cold, it's advisable to bring a sleeping bag too as it does get pretty chilly at night. Bring lots of warm clothes and you'll be set to enjoy this beautiful spot. Warm showers and toilets await you and more prayer flags than you'll have ever seen before, decorating the surrounds!
Nepal Impact Marathon: Base Camp Package.pageTitle: Nepal Impact Marathon: Base Camp Package - Impact Marathon Series

Nepal Impact Marathon: Summit Camp.productDescription:
Living in our stunning Athletes' Village is an unforgettable experience. Rise each morning for yoga as the sun rises over the Himalaya, spend the day working on inspiring projects in the local community, enjoy Momos and a cold beer at the Sunset Bar... then wrap up warm for a peaceful sleep. Not bad eh? 

The entire week is about community: the Nepali community; the Athlete's community and your own community at home. This is not a race but a platform to create massive social change and you are about to become part of a global movement to unleash the #powerofrunning. 



For those who want that little bit extra. Your first night will be in a beautiful 3* hotel in central Kathmandu before heading up to our stunning campsite in Kakani. Just one other roommate here, and when we say room we mean a huge tent, with beds, shelves, seats. We have created your glamping (glamorous camping) to ensure that even if this is your first night under canvas, you will be a few steps closer to heaven. It's simple but it will feel like home, your own cocoon above the clouds.

You will open your tent to the north each morning and take in the wonders of the Himalaya. You have showers and toilets just a few feet from your tent and all bedding is provided - but if you feel the cold, we'd recommend you bring a sleeping bag as it can get pretty chilly at night.
Nepal Impact Marathon: Summit Camp.pageTitle: Nepal Impact Marathon: Summit Camp - Impact Marathon Series
